articles.author: Gaia Pianigiani
articles.title: Sicily Registers Record-High Temperature as Heat Wave Sweeps Italian Island - The New York Times
articles.description: A monitoring station on the island reported a temperature of 119.84 Fahrenheit, 48.8 degrees Celsius, on Wednesday. If verified, it would be the highest ever recorded in Europe.
articles.content: In recent years we have observed more frequent and more intense heat waves in Italy, Antonello Pasini, a climate change physicist at Italys National Council for Research, said in a phone interview. L… [+1414 chars]
